name: Ski Race Club - Mass Start Downhill Challenge
name_original: Ski Race Club - Mass Start Downhill Challenge
description:
Join the trendy SKI Race Club!

Carve your way through the endless mountains covered by numerous hedges.

Overcome obstacles that stand in your way.

Encounter with multiplayers while weawing through trees, houses and other barriers in order to finish first.

Become the conquer of downhill!


***FEATURES***
Select view: top or perspective;
Choose the mode to start conquering the hills;
4 main modes: Endless, Beginner, Proffesional, Extreme;
Easy controls specifically designed for precise & intuitive skiing;


An endless mountain of untouched snow awaits in this decoying and engrossing journey!
